# Update product regression tests

Execute the **regression** workflow as a **QA Engineer**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_QA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_QA.md)

## Workflow

Update Product Regression Tests:
1. Identify Feature being modified
2. Create/update regression test documentation
3. Create rt-f-PRX-NNN-description.md using template
4. Link to Product Feature

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/rt-template.md`

## Output

products/{id}/qa/regression-tests/rt-f-PRX-*.md
